rules_text: Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Runeclad Seeker gets +1/+1 until end of turn. If that spell was an Aura or Equipment spell, put a +1/+1 counter on Runeclad Seeker instead.
flavor_text: [i]It took little time for Lovi's survivors to discover runes, a form of magic usable by anyone.[/i]
